basics.name: Chen Hsin-Yi
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Chen Hsin-Yi, also named as 'hychen', is a full stack web programmer who also has PC and emebdeed Linux system intergration experiences. He has a strong background in participating with open source communities and projects in Taiwan, by hosting events and contributing software patchs to different communities.

work.summary: Vectr is a real time collaboration vector image editor, built on top of JavaScript & Node.js

highlights: Build some prototype of start-up ideas. one of ideas is something like AWS API Gateway.
Study Flow-based Programming, Coordination Language and Models and Web Service Composition.
Win the first prize of 2014 Open Data Hackthon of Tainan City
Work closely with client to build cloud infrastructure of IOT pet camera hardware.

work.summary: Canonical is a UK-based privately held computer software company to market commercial support and related services for Ubuntu and related projects.
highlights: Ensure successful end-to-end technical integration with hardware OEM/ODM and chipset vendors to enable new platforms for running GNU/Linux Ubuntu .
Debug and customize a wide range of software components in Ubuntu.
Work closely with tier-one customers to develop factory state recover and mass production tools

work.summary: Jorjin Technologies Inc is the supplier of wireless system-in-package (SiP) modules.
highlights: Provid Android/Linux ARM wireless driver engineering support for OEM customers.
Implement propriatary SDIO host controller of Freescale iMx51 and TI OMAP3530 for TI 1271 Android/Linux wireless driver.
Port 0xdroid(Android BSP of BeagleBoard) to Devkit8000(BeagleBoard clone).
